text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea chaiana is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Borneo.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea chaiana". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33408A9781034. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33408A9781034.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
